r.d: This package is based on the libradius of FreeBSD, with some modifications and extensions. This PECL provides full support for RADIUS authentication (RFC 2865) and RADIUS accounting (RFC 2866), works on Unix and on Windows. Its an easy way to authenticate your users against the user-database of your OS (for example against Windows Active-Directory via IAS).
r.n: - Fixed bug #65156 (Please provide LICENSE file). (Adam) - Fixed bug #65378 (radius.c:706: error: too many arguments to function ‘rad_salt_value’). (Adam) - Fixed bug #65599 (Fix compiling for VC11 x64). (Jan Ehrhardt)
